amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that $50 million will be available for the Emergency Conservation Program (drought relief) under the Agricultural Credit Act of 1978.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to ensure that $50 million will be available for the emergency conservation program under the Agricultural Credit Act of 1978.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 276 (Roll no. 304).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 276 (Roll no. 304).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
